steps.title: Find an image of the custom mog emoji and add it to your keyboard.
steps.content: Find an image of the custom mog emoji and add it to your keyboard. Download an image of the custom mog emoji to your camera roll from apps like Pinterest, TikTok, or Instagram. Open your keyboard, click the emoji icon, and swipe left to the Stickers section. Click Open Stickers, click the sticker icon next to the clock, and select New Sticker. Once your camera roll opens, select the image youâ€™d like to use, hold your finger down on the emoji, and click Add Sticker. [4] X Research source

steps.title: Mog emojis represent mogging, or outclassing another person.
steps.content: Mog emojis represent mogging, or outclassing another person. Mog stands for â€œalpha male of the group.â€ [5] X Research source Mog emoji combinations are most often used to represent mogging, or outclassing, another person in a particular thing. Mogging is mainly used to refer to someoneâ€™s superior attractiveness, whether it be their physical attractiveness, how well their outfit is put together, or how they carry themselves. It can be used to refer to the attractiveness of you or someone else. For example: [6] X Research source Your Friend: â€œBro, the way you put that fit together is so tuff ğŸ—¿â€ You: Appreciate it, bro. Had to get a calm fit off today. Iâ€™m tryna impress the huzz ğŸ¤«ğŸ§â€

steps.title: Compliment the other person to make them feel attractive.
steps.content: Compliment the other person to make them feel attractive. When someone sends you a mog emoji combination, reply with a compliment or emoji combination that hypes them up and makes them feel attractive. Expressing how you feel about your appearance can be tough, and receiving a compliment can really affirm those feelings of attractiveness and make you feel good. steps.content: Rizz Emojis Rizz is short for charisma and refers to your ability to charm someone in a romantic sense. Using rizz emojis is a great way to flirt over text and jokingly express your attraction to another person. steps.content: Mewing Emojis Similar to mog emojis, mewing emojis are used to symbolize mewing and looksmaxxing. steps.title: Sus Emojis
steps.content: Sus Emojis Sus emojis are most commonly used to convey that something is suspicious, sketchy, or abnormal. Sus emojis and emoji combinations are useful to express your suspicions about what someone is saying or doing.
